game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR 146.5 & BR 668.2 ‘Intercity 2’ Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Experience modern passenger traction in the form of DB’s stylish “IC2”, which is ready for service in Train Simulator!
